name: Black Diamond Raven Ice Axe
description: Like a good friend, this axe makes a fine companion when crossing glaciers or slogging through snow. It's maneuverable and comfortable to carry, thanks to the ergonomically shaped head, and a reworked spike bites well in ice for secure plunging.Stainless steel head and spike.Aluminum shaft has a trapezoidal cross-section for a comfortable grip.Updated pick, adze and spike for secure placements and efficient chopping.Leash not included.
